explanation: [0-0] A basketball player in a blue jersey is standing on the court, the blurred background suggesting he's running fast.

[0-3] The man in blue then sprints forward. Suddenly, a long-haired man in a white tracksuit appears opposite him and they both jump up simultaneously. The player in blue raises his hand, attempting to dunk the basketball, while the player in white reaches out to block the shot. As the ball reaches its peak, both players' hands are on it. The white-clad player successfully deflects the ball, preventing it from entering the basket. Upon landing, the player in white celebrates by excitedly placing his hand on his chest, while the player in blue applauds him from behind.
